subject: A Snow White cosplay featuring a person in a stylized blue and yellow lace crochet bikini with red bow accessories
action: Standing in a playful pose on a beach, holding a red apple with one hand raised gracefully
setting: Sunny beach with ocean waves and sandy shore, clear blue sky with soft clouds

style.artistic_style: contemporary fashion photography with cosplay elements
style.rendering_technique: high-quality digital photography with natural lighting

lighting.type: bright natural sunlight with soft shadows
lighting.color_palette: vibrant royal blue, golden yellow, bright red accents, light blue sky, beige sand

detail_level: high detail, emphasizing the lace crochet bikini, costume elements, facial expression, and beach environment
atmosphere: playful and whimsical, blending fairy tale elements with modern beach aesthetic
cultural_reference: modern interpretation of Snow White fairy tale character
negative_prompt: Avoid low quality, blur, distorted proportions, harsh shadows, oversaturation, unnatural poses, or inconsistent lighting
